name: Razer
description: Razer is the world leader in devices and software platforms that enable, connect and entertain a worldwide community of electronic entertainment enthusiasts, 24/7. At Razer, everything it does resonates with the company credo: For Gamers. By Gamers.

funding.investors: IDG Capital Partners, IDG-Accel China Fund
